title: IM LOOKING FOR A SMURF DUO PARTNER THAT WILL CARRY ME. (GIFTING SKINS)
body: i need somone to carry me out of bronze or be my commited duo partner. i get these r%%%%%ed asss teammates that go 0-5 and etc you know the point pleaes give me a add. i keep ranking and deranking cuz of stupid teammates. ADDD ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
